release_note: Minor fixes for iOS16 Improvements with iCloud syncing
Minor bug fixes for iOS15 Fixed issues with cloud drives
Minor bug fix for old iOS devices
Fixed minor bug for some PRO users Update for iOS14
Fixed bug with share menu Minor bug fixes improvements

iCloud Sync fix If you activated iCloud syncing in the previous version 3.4 and cannot find your recordings please go to the Settings tab in Voice Recorder then iCloud Support and turn off iCloud Syncing. Your recordings should reappear. You can then reactivate iCloud Syncing if you would like with the latest version of Voice Recorder Please contact us through the support link in Voice Recorder if you have any issues

iCloud Sync support Test transcription feature for free More minor improvements bug fixes
Fixed bugs with Call Recorder feature You can now continue and restart transcriptions Fixed bug with FaceID on iOS12 Minor bug fixes improvements

CALL RECORDER Requires subscription Record incoming and outgoing phone calls. To record a phone call you must facilitate a 3 way conference call. The third caller is our recording line that will save your phone call. It is not possible to record phone calls using the built in microphone on your iPhone. No limit on how many recordings. No per minute fee. Just a monthly subscription. Compatible with iPhone X Bug fixes Improvements
